bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers

Class PlannableHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
      • bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.PlannableHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RepeatableHandler, TimeOutHandler

    public abstract class PlannableHandler
extends org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
    A PlannableHandler class extends BukkitRunnable and handles all classes which are Plannable. It is a void factory for a TimeOutHandler, a TimedRepeatableHandler and a ConditionalRepeatHandler. The Bukkit JavaPlugin needs to be set through the setPlugin(JavaPlugin) method before using it in a plugin. After that, classes can be added through the handlePlannable(Plannable) method.

    • Method Detail

      • setPlugin

        public static void setPlugin(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin)

      • handlePlannable

        public static void handlePlannable(Plannable plannable)
        A static method which instantiates a new PlannableHandler according the type of the given Plannable. This instance is not returned because the bukkit scheduler handles this by its own.
        Parameters:
        plannable - The Plannable for which the time out functionality is handled.

      • cancelTimeOut

        public static void cancelTimeOut(Plannable plannable,
                 boolean runTimeout)
        Cancels the given scheduled Plannable. If runTimeout is true, the timeout method will be called.
